price: ߊ߲ ߧߋ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߘߍ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ߬ ߤߌߣߊߒߕߋ ߕߍ߬ߟߊ ߘߐ߫ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߸ ߣߊ߬ߓߊ߰ ߞߙߎ ߘߌ߫
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ إِلَى ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ وَفۡدٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma naḥshuru al-mutaqīna ilā al-raḥmāni wafdan
